liability_cap: No explicit monetary liability cap stated in the provided excerpts; agreement includes exclusions of indirect/consequential damages (subject to clause 10.3).
risk_explanation: This appears to be a technology licensing agreement with broad indemnities and extensive IP/patent-related subject matter, which can create significant exposure for a small vendor. The limitation of liability language shown focuses on excluding indirect/consequential damages but does not clearly state a monetary cap, increasing financial risk.
